text: Annie Girardot (25 October 1931 – 28 February 2011) was a French actress. She played independent, hard-working and lonely women in many of her movies. She played Françoise in Love is a Funny Thing. She also played Marie Louise in Hearth Fires. Girardot was born in Paris. She died there from Alzheimer's disease at age seventy-nine. ==References== Category:French television actors Category:French movie actors Category:Actors from Paris Category:1931 births Category:2011 deaths
title: Annie Girardot
